Articles.Content:
So im having a weird issue with TST and contares probes.  the telescopes in TST work fine but the ones is Contares Probes has the camera at a 90 degree angle to the scope. 

I have tested with only TST and Probes installed and it still happens.

log file is https://www.dropbox.com/s/i59hzgmbiov9nrr/output_log.txt?dl=0

Also posting a picture of the problem https://www.dropbox.com/s/vwdv8960c83ha5s/JPEG_20190919_172547.jpg?dl=0

 

Will also post this in the TST post

Edited September 21, 2019 by Trem Fantasma
